description:
Blinkit is India’s last minute app. Trusted by millions, it is your everyday online grocery shopping app that home-delivers 10,000+ daily groceries in just a blink. Buy milk products, fresh fruits & vegetables, daily grocery, kitchen, home & office items by shopping for them online on Blinkit. Enjoy easy and smooth app experience with quick delivery.

- Best price and quality fresh fruits & vegetables
- Milk, curd, bread, butter, eggs, cheese, paneer & other daily grocery
- Snacks, biscuits, chips, ice cream, chocolates
- Cold drinks, ice, bottle opener
- Atta, rice, dal, oil, masalas, noodles
- Personal care, detergent, cleaning supplies
- Diapers & baby care
- Pet food
- Bulbs, batteries, mobile chargers
- Emergency medicines, thermometer
- Kitchen tools like chopper, blender, grinder
- Puja needs
- Stationery
- Smart watches, LED lights, Headphones



Beauty & skincare store
Makeup, luxury beauty brands & everyday skincare – now on Blinkit! Shop a huge range of authentic makeup, bath & body, hair care products, beauty accessories & much more!

Electronics store
Wireless or bluetooth earphones? Check. Smart watches? Yes. LED lights? Absolutely! Shop affordable and latest electronics online at best prices, only on Blinkit.

Safe and quick grocery delivery app
The average driving speed for Blinkit (formerly Grofers) delivery agents is 20kmph, since we have a grocery delivery store located every 2 km to instantly serve you.

Many safe payment options
Do your grocery shopping online on Blinkit & pay safely and securely for your groceries with UPI, COD or cards / wallets / netbanking / buy now pay later. We accept Sodexo meal pass and Paytm food wallet too.

Authentic phone accessories
We don’t want you to wait for the most premium and authentic phone accessories out there – which is why you can get them in minutes on Blinkit.

Printouts delivered in minutes
With Blinkit, you can get a printout of anything delivered in just minutes. With convenient options of both black & white and coloured prints, get all your documents sorted instantly!

Low prices, amazing offers
Blinkit (formerly Grofers) offers you big discounts and savings on daily grocery, bundles and bank offers. We give the best prices on online groceries with our monthly House Full Sale!

Live order tracking & helpful customer support
Track your grocery order online, right from your payment being confirmed to the delivery of your groceries. In case you need help, simply tap & chat with our customer support executives who are always ready to assist you.

Delivering groceries in 20+ cities
Instantly do your grocery shopping online! Get delivery of milk, vegetables, bread, snacks & more on the Blinkit app in Ahmedabad, Bengaluru, Chandigarh, Chennai, Delhi, Faridabad, Gurgaon, Hyderabad, Jaipur, Jalandhar, Kanpur, Kolkata, Lucknow, Ludhiana, Meerut, Mohali, Mumbai, Panchkula, Pune, Noida, Ghaziabad, Vadodara & Zirakpur.

Huge variety of local & international brands
Blinkit (formerly Grofers) grocery delivery app has a huge variety of shopping brands available online, including local specialities. In fact, Blinkit has brands you won’t find anywhere else. You can get delivery of daily grocery, festival special products, and even gourmet and international foods! Get the latest products from leading brands like boAt, The Wishing Chair, Ekam, MasterChow, The Body Shop, Farmley, Engage, The Whole Truth, The Moms Co, SuperBottoms, Tropicana, Nestle, Coca Cola, Lay’s, Harvest, Ferrero, Toblerone, Oreo, Nutella, Starbucks, Clinique, Kama Ayurveda, L'Occitane, Innisfree, Davidoff, Rage Coffee, Lindt, Starbucks, Blue Tokai, Sleepy Owl, Wingreens Farms, Bagrry's, Gunsberg, Jade Forest, Jimmy's Cocktails, Eveready, Nivea, Garnier, Lakmé, Haldiram's, Bikano, Heinz, Vahdam, Dettol, Cadbury, ITC, Colgate Palmolive, PepsiCo, Durex, Licious, Aashirvaad, Saffola, Patanjali, Fortune, 24 Mantra, TGL Co., Nestle, Amul, Dabur, & many more.

Whether you’re chasing dreams, running meetings, or taking a break — Zomato is built for the ones who don’t slow down. Craving biryani between brainstorms? A cheesy burger after a long day? Or just a salad and chai to keep things steady? With lightning-fast delivery from over 3 lakh restaurants, your fuel is never far. Order in seconds, track every bite, and keep going. Hustle harder – we’ve got the food.

▪ Search and Discover Top Restaurants and Dishes
From butter chicken to sushi, dal makhani to dimsums – and legends like Domino’s, Pizza Hut, McDonald’s, Starbucks, and more – Zomato puts your cravings on speed dial. Just decisions, made easy.

▪ Access Restaurant Details
 Menus, ratings, reviews, photos – everything you need to decide fast and eat faster. Rate your meal to guide the next hungry hustler.

▪ Try Veg Mode
Veg Mode curates top vegetarian dishes, veg-only restaurants, and even veg-only delivery fleets. Clean eating with no compromise.

▪ Schedule Your Orders
 Time is currency. Lock in your lunch or dinner before the hunger hits. The scheduling feature lets you plan ahead and stay on track.

▪ Food on Train
 Even when you’re on the move, Zomato keeps up. Enter your PNR, pick your dish, and get your meal delivered to your seat at 130+ stations. No chaos, no compromises –  just food (and your schedule) right on track.

Hungry or Need Groceries in 10 minutes?

Welcome to Swiggy, your one-stop shop for online food ordering, groceries, dining, and convenient pickup & delivery!

Here's why India LOVES Swiggy:

• Order food & order groceries to get 10 min grocery delivery, & other essential services online
• Swiggy One users get unlimited Free Delivery on all orders including instant grocery
• Find top local restaurants like Mcdonald's & Burger King in your city
• Order Groceries like Maggi, Chocolate, and Amul fresh cream & enjoy lightening delivery in 10 Mins with Instamart
• Get discounts by paying dining out bills via our Dineout section
• Real-time updates on your food & instant grocery order status & an ETA 
• Make payments via VISA/MasterCard Credit or Debit Cards, Net Banking, Paytm, cash on delivery, credit services like LazyPay, & more

Food Delivery: Order Delicious Food With A Tap
Get Up To 60% Off + Free Delivery with Pocket Hero's picks

• No Minimum Order conditions, so you can order even a single item on Swiggy.
• Order chicken shawarma, Margherita pizza, masala dosa, burgers, pasta, coffee, chicken momos, desserts, & more.
• Explore our endless range of cuisines, including North Indian, Chinese food, South Indian, Thai, Healthy, Street Food, Breakfast, Late-Night Cravings, & more.
• Get North Indian food, Punjabi cuisine, South Indian cuisine, Italian and Bengali cuisine with top chains like Domino's Pizza, Wow Momo, KFC, Burger King, Pizza Hut, FreshMenu, McDonald's, Subway, Faasos, Starbucks coffee, and more.
• Find local restaurants, breakfast places, brunch spots, cafes & bars

INSTAMART - Get Anything In 10 Minutes

Instamart delivers groceries and more to your doorstep within 10 Minutes. Order groceries, emergency supplies, midnight cravings, cake deliveries, and more.

• From Knorr soup , fruit delivery, country delight ghee and diet coke, vegetables, Amul ice cream, Bisleri, dairy, Cadbury chocolate, cleaning essentials, personal care products like Santoor soap and Sunsilk shampoo, and baby care, you can find everything here.
• Present in 120+ cities, open from 6 a.m. to late at night* for 10 min grocery delivery like Maggi, Pringles Chips, Nescafe Coffee, and more.
*Opening & closing times might vary across cities owing to Govt. regulations.
• Grab 30,000+ products across groceries & other items like toys, stationery, home & kitchen appliances, electronics, beauty & more.

DINEOUT - deals on dining out at top restaurants

• Use Swiggy Dine out app to get up to 50% FLAT discounts with no upper limit on your dining-out bills.
• Over 40,000+ restaurants across 40+ cities 
• Up to 15% off on your bills with HDFC Bank Credit Cards
• Pre-book your table for hassle-free dining
• Find Cafes, bars, pubs, breweries, luxury dining, kid-friendly, rooftop dining, brunch buffets, and much more!

With Swiggy One, you'll experience savings like never before. 

• Order food online and get Unlimited free delivery + extra 30% discount from top restaurants
• Unlimited free delivery on all Instamart orders
• 0 surge fee

Order Food Delivery In Train IRCTC Delivery

Now, you can enjoy Swiggy's online food delivery even while traveling! With Swiggy's IRCTC delivery service, order food on train from top-rated restaurants at major railway stations and have it delivered directly to your train seat. Enter your train number, and let Swiggy handle the rest.

This is an official mobile ordering app of Domino’s Pizza India. Now get your cheesy meals with incredible deals, only in 30 minutes!

Looking to order food online? Well, it better be Domino’s Pizza!
If you’re ordering Domino’s pizza online in India, Sri Lanka, or Bangladesh, get treated with delicious piping-hot pizzas, thanks to our extensive pizza delivery network available across the countries.

App Features:
* Easy Order Customization- Cheese Burst Pizza, Pepsi, Garlic Bread, Chicken Wings or Choco Lava Cake. Choose from our wide range of offerings and customize them the way you like! Also, we got some new offerings for you- African Peri Peri, English Cheddar & Cheese, Aussie Barbeque, Jamaican Jerk Spice and Indi Tandoori. Order them now!  
* Advance Ordering- Got a party coming up? Order your favorite pizzas in advance with domino’s pizza coupons!
* Late-Night ordering- Next time your hunger pangs strike 12 midnight, just open Domino’s App and order away
* One-Click Reorder- You can reorder your previous orders with just one click. So get, set, clickin’!
* Save your favorites- Liked our treats? You can save them in your favorites and order whenever, and wherever you like!
* IRCTC Train Ordering- Now get your cheesy meals on the go! Introducing our new ‘Deliver on Train’ feature in collaboration with IRCTC that helps you order while you travel. *T&C apply.
* Exclusive offers- Be it weekend or the middle of the week, pizza cravings can strike anytime. No stress, we got you covered with exclusive Domino’s coupons and offer deals for every day of the week. So now check out Domino’s offer today and apply Domino’s coupon codes with just one click!
* Easy order tracking- 30-minutes too long to pass? Log into our tracking feature and see our home delivery expert deliver to your doorstep. 
* Hassle-free payments- With multiple payment options on your fingertips, it’s now easier than ever to pay for your order.

How to Order?
1. Download the Domino’s app
2. Log into your account
3. Set your location for the nearest Domino’s store
4. Explore through Domino’s pizza menu with that gives you best offers for the price you pay. Do checkout app-exclusive Domino’s Pizza offer 
5. Checkout and fill your address
6. Select the payment options
7. Now sit back and relax! Your pizza will arrive in 30 minutes!

Have any feedback or queries? 
Domino’s customer care is happy to help! Write to us at guestcaredominos@jublfood.com
For more details, log into dominos.co.in

The official Burger King India app is now available for you to place your order, be it for safe and contactless dine-in, takeaway or food delivery. With the App, you can Have It Your Way in a few simple steps, and earn yourself some Crown rewards while you’re at it.

 

Taste, Your Way

We take your Trust in Taste very seriously, which is why with the Burger King App you have access to the freshest additions to the menu.

Want something big, juicy and flame grilled? Want it made Your Way with double patties extra cheese? We got a Whopper for you.

Craving those munchies? We got fries of more than one kind.

Feeling like going back to the classics? We got that irreplaceable taste for you.

Need to shake off those blues? We got some thick shakes to cheer you up.

Order through the App to let the King adapt to your taste, and recommend food items according to your preferences. 

 

Offers, Your Way

The Burger King app is Home to all the exclusive deals on your favourite dishes from the Burger King Menu. Download the app for meal prices like you’ve never seen before!

Use your crown points to redeem further discounts and offers.

 

BK Loyalty Program

The King always rewards loyalty. Earn crowns points on the Burger King app with each order. The more you collect, the greater the reward for you!

Pro tip: Shake your phone once you’ve downloaded the app to earn your crowns before you start filling up your cart.

 

Order Your Way

Wanna eat your Whopper at home in your pyjamas? The App’s got you covered with BK Delivery. Enjoy your freshly flame grilled Whopper brought to you at your doorstep through safe deliveries.

 

Wish to enjoy your meal on-the-go? Have it your way with zero contact ordering and safe takeaways by placing your order on the App. P.S- Do not blame us if you finish most of your Hi-Fries on your way back home.

 

Looking for the full Burger King experience with safe dine-ins while wearing the crown? Use this opportunity to earn some crowns as well on the Burger King app while going contactless in Your Way of ordering at the stores.

 

Finally, the King

Find out more about the Home of the Whopper on Brand Wall and you’ll learn the BK lingo in no time. At Burger King, we like to keep things real & authentic, just like the flavours in our food. Get a sneak peek into the King’s journey and how the Flame Grill came about. Learn what makes the Whopper so Imperfectly Perfect. After all, we take our food (not ourselves) very seriously.

Bistro: by Blinkit - Food in Minutes
Craving something delicious but short on time? Bistro is your ultimate food delivery companion, bringing a world of flavors to your doorstep in just 10 minutes! Whether it’s a quick snack, a hearty meal, or a refreshing beverage, we’ve got you covered with an extensive menu to suit every craving and occasion.

Why choose Bistro?

- Diverse Menu Selection: From crispy snacks to filling meals, desserts to hot and cold beverages, Bistro offers something for everyone.
- Lightning-Fast Delivery: Delivered to your doorstep in just 10 minutes—perfect for your busy lifestyle.
- Unparalleled Convenience: Whether it’s breakfast, lunch, dinner, or a quick bite, order anytime and satisfy your hunger in minutes.

Explore our menu

- Classic samosas, cheesy burgers, crispy fries, sandwiches, and more.
- Flavorsome thalis, rice bowls, pastas, biryanis, and hearty curries crafted to perfection.
- From freshly brewed aromatic coffees and energizing teas to smoothies, iced beverages, and refreshing juices.
- Decadent cakes, gooey brownies, ice creams, and a variety of sweet treats to end your meal on a high note.

An effortless experience

- Live order tracking: Know exactly when your food is prepared, packed, and on its way to you.
- Multiple payment options: Pay securely through UPI, credit/debit cards, wallets, or cash on delivery.
- Customer support: Our friendly customer care team is available to assist you with any queries or concerns.

How do we do it?
With strategically located kitchens and highly optimized processes, Bistro ensures your food reaches you piping hot (or refreshingly cold) in record time.

Serving happiness, anytime, anywhere
Whether you’re at home, at work, or on the go, Bistro is always ready to serve. No matter the occasion—quick office lunches, late-night cravings, or relaxed evenings—Bistro is just a tap away.

Download Bistro today!
Transform the way you eat with Bistro, the 10-minute food delivery app that redefines convenience. Explore a world of flavors, discover new favorites, and enjoy the joy of delicious food delivered faster than ever before.

Welcome to the new official McDonald’s app.

The app is filled with great offers specially tailored to you. Deals and discounts appear regularly so check back often to see what’s new.

The news section keeps you up to date with everything that’s going on in McDonald’s near you. Look here for new games and competitions.

The nutrition section provides information on our entire menu. We provide allergy advice and nutritional information on everything from the Big Mac to a single dip!

Use our restaurant finder to find your nearest McDonald’s. Filter your search based on opening hours, facilities and get directions from wherever you are.

Welcome to India's 3rd largest food delivery app :)

Sign up now to enjoy a variety of deals and offers. Lucky new users can get up to 70% OFF (up to INR 150) and free delivery on food order. Order from McDonald's, Faasos, Behrouz Biryani, WOW! Momo and 10,000+ more restaurants near you. Offer valid for new users in Bangalore, Pune, Ahmedabad, Chennai, Jaipur, Lucknow, Kolkata, Mumbai, Hyderabad, Navi Mumbai, Thane, Howrah, Hooghly, Kalyan, New Delhi, Gurgaon, Noida, Ghaziabad and Faridabad. Free delivery applicable on orders above the minimum order value at select restaurants.

magicpin brings alive the best of shopping and savings from stores near you. Earn points on every purchase – whenever and wherever you shop. Use those points to get cashback, vouchers, pay at stores and order from your favourite local shops. Just upload pictures of your receipts or transaction SMS on magicpin and watch the savings and rewards roll in. Discover, shop and save with the best offers from your favourite brands across food, fashion, grocery, beauty, pharmacy, electronics, entertainment, travel, technology and more. 

How The Magic Happens 
1. Pin your location for amazing discounts, offers, cashback and vouchers from your favourite stores and brands
2. Discover and shop from nearby restaurants, grocery stores, fashion stores, electronics stores, pharmacies and beauty stores 
3. Upload your bills or share transaction SMS wherever you go shopping to earn magicPoints
4. Use magicPoints to buy super-saver vouchers for all your favourite retail stores and use the points in-store or for home deliveries from restaurants, grocery stores and pharmacies
5. Use magicPay to pay at shops and for delivery orders to earn instant rewards and magicPoints
6. The more you shop, the more magicPoints you earn, which you can use to shop even more 



Where The Magic Happens 
Get the best offers and earn savings and rewards at all stores near you. These include:
• Fashion and brand stores
• Grocery stores and supermarkets
• Restaurants
• Electronics stores
• Pharmacy orders delivered home in 45 minutes
• Spas, salons and beauty parlours
• Home delivery of orders from nearby restaurants, grocery stores and pharmacies
• Mobile recharges
• Gyms
• Travel vouchers
• Hotels
• Movies, concerts and events
• Online stores like Flipkart, Amazon, Myntra, AJIO and Nykaa

. . .and many more places near you!

Daily Deal Alerts 
• Get daily discounts with coupon codes and vouchers for leading brands and stores near you
• Mega offers on brands like Pantaloons, Big Bazaar, Superdry, Armani Exchange, Croma and many more
• Refer your friends to get free gift vouchers, rewards and magicPoints
• Use GroupBuy to buy vouchers with your friends and earn more magicPoints
• 4 PM Big Friday Sales: Save up to 90% on everything

Brands On Board 
With over 900,000 local and online stores across 40 cities, magicpin is your gateway to a brand new world. From the biggest brands to your local favourites, get savings, discounts, vouchers and the best deals for all your shopping.  

Some of the top brands on magicpin are:
• Titan
• Fastrack 
• Pepe Jeans
• Shoppers Stop 
• Pantaloons 
• Spykar
• Calvin Klein
• Lifestyle 
• Starbucks 
• Café Coffee Day 
• McDonald’s 
• Pizza Hut 
• Domino's 
• Biryani By Kilo
• Faasos 
• Behrouz Biryani 
• Wow! Momos 
• Bikanervala 
• BTW 
• A2B 
• Bahar Biryani
• Uber
• BookMyShow



The magicpin Feed 
Discover the best of shopping, lifestyle and entertainment in your city. 
• Follow your friends and top magicpin users (called magicians)
• Find the best places to shop, dine, party and hang out in your neighbourhood
• Discover places and brands trending among your friends 
• Engage with your friends and magicians and save their recommendations and reviews
• Apply to become a magician and share your discoveries with the magicpin community

Welcome to EatSure – The Food Court App
EatSure is your ultimate solution for ordering food online! Discover a wide range of delicious dishes from your favorite restaurants and get them delivered right to your doorstep. Satisfy your cravings with just a few taps!

Features:
Extensive Restaurant Selection
Browse through a wide range of restaurants offering multiple cuisines – Indian, Chinese, Italian, Mexican, and more!
We are home to some of India's most loved restaurants – Faasos, Oven Story Pizza, Behrouz Biryani, Wendy's, Kwality Walls, Mad Over Donuts, SLAY Coffee, Sweet Truth, Firangi Bake, Lunchbox, The Good Bowl, The Biryani Life, Baskin Robbins, Go Zero, Prasuma Momos, Zomoz, Naturals Ice Cream, Marrakesh, Anand Sweets & Savouries, and many more.
Seamless Ordering Experience
Enjoy a simple and hassle-free ordering process. Browse menus, customize dishes to your liking, and checkout easily — it's that simple!
Real-Time Order Tracking
Track your food from the kitchen to your doorstep with live order updates. Know exactly when your meal will arrive.
EatSure Elite Loyalty Program
Step into the world of EatSure Elite, where it's more than just perks — it's a status!
Enjoy free delivery on orders above ₹199, get a free dish on orders above ₹499, and use SurePoints to upgrade your dish.
Why settle for ordinary when you can be an Elite?
Best Price Guarantee
Unlike other platforms, our restaurant partners don't pay hefty commissions — the savings come directly to you!
Order from Behrouz, Oven Story, Faasos, LunchBox, and other trusted brands at the best prices — guaranteed!
Secure Payment Options
Pay easily and safely through credit/debit cards, UPI, and mobile wallets. Your personal information is always secure.
Buy 1 Get 1 Free Across Restaurants
Our revolutionary Buy 1 Get 1 Free lets you choose any two dishes from two cuisines and get one absolutely free!
Customer Reviews & Ratings
Make informed decisions by checking genuine reviews and ratings from real users about food quality and delivery service.
We Deliver Across 80+ Cities in India
Order your favorite meals from trusted restaurants across major cities and towns.

Download EatSure today!
Experience the convenience of online food delivery with the EatSure Food Court App.
Savor the flavors, indulge in culinary delights, and make every meal memorable.

KFC India – Your Chicken, Your Rules
Craving crispy? The KFC App’s got you covered with deals, speed, and a free Zinger Burger to kick things off. It’s not just food—it’s a vibe.


Why download? Because you’re smart (and hungry):
•	Order for delivery, dine-in or takeaway – your chicken, your way.
•	First order? You get a FREE Zinger Burger. Yes, really.
•	Get a fresh offer every time you order. No kidding.
•	Access App-only legends like the Double Down Burger that you won’t find anywhere else.
•	Best prices across all channels. Your wallet will thank you.
•	Skip the queue when you order dine-in or takeaway. Be the boss of the line.
•	Schedule orders, save your favorites, and store your address for lightning-fast reorders.


Download now and turn your cravings into crispy celebrations. Don’t just eat. Feast like a legend—with the KFC App.

Get best deals at top restaurants. Reserve a table now.

EazyDiner is the best app you’ll ever need to discover restaurants, make table reservations to avail great deals every time you eat out.  If you love to explore new & exotic dishes in your vicinity, EazyDiner helps you to choose from 10,000+ restaurants across India & Dubai.

Created by a team of industry experts who are hoteliers and chefs from around the globe, you can choose from handpicked and curated restaurant selection for your next dining out experience. EazyDiner members get best deals and discounts ranging from free drinks to 50% off on total bill. Our Prime membership ensures guaranteed 25% to 50 % discounts. All our members enjoy deal on every meal.

Discover Restaurants & Reserve a Table

Reserve a table at best restaurants in all top cities such as Delhi-NCR, Pune, Mumbai, Bangalore, Kolkata, Chennai, Ahmedabad, Hyderabad and 150 other cities in India & Dubai. The EazyDiner app helps you find top restaurants in your city depending on your choice of cuisine, restaurant, and location. Keep a track of your current and past bookings and also share the booking details with friends and family. Reserve a table at trendy restaurants in just a few clicks and save time & money!

Earn and Splurge EazyPoints

EazyPoints are loyalty points that you earn by making table reservations with EazyDiner, eating out, writing a review and even by referring a friend. You’ll be amazed to explore the variety of redemption offers we have in store for you. You can redeem EazyPoints for FREE 1-night stays at 5-star hotel properties across the country. Keep on uploading the bill and pay via the app to earn more and more EazyPoints. The more the merrier!

Dine like a VIP with EazyDiner Prime

EazyDiner Prime gives guaranteed 25% and upto 50% discounts for members. Dine like a VIP every time you go out. The membership provides higher discounts, access to dining events, F&B experiences along with give 2X extra EazyPoints on every booking.

EazyDiner Savings – Big, Bigger, Biggest!

Go cashless and pay your food bill through the EazyDiner app with additional bank offers. Make big on savings at over 2500 restaurants with our PayEazy feature that lets you make 100% safe online food bill payments (cashless), provides EXTRA PayEazy exclusive discounts every time you pay your dining bill and also lets you earn additional EazyPoints.

Stay Abreast of Latest Food Trends, New Dining Spots & Restaurant Reviews:

As and when a new restaurant opens up in your vicinity, we’ll get on a mission to make you gorge its signature delights with the top deals there. With exclusive expert reviews by top food critics helmed by our co-founder, the iconic Vir Sanghvi, EazyDiner doubles up as your personal guide to an extensive range of dining options in your city. Install the EazyDiner app, read quality restaurant reviews, which will help you plan the next meal at your choice of restaurant with best deals & discounts.

24x7 Culinary Concierge to Delight your Dining Experience

To make sure you have a swift and smooth dining experience, EazyDiner offers a 24x7 concierge facility. Ping for any assistance & eat out without any worry!

Deli-very very Safe

If you don’t feel like going out and wish to eat your favourite dishes in the comforts of your home, bring EazyDiner to your rescue and get exciting deals on delivery as well. EazyDiner provides safe food deliveries and takeaway services from selected restaurants in your city those which are following strict guidelines and safety measures like frequent temperature checks, sanitization process and time-to-time visits to monitor the safety standards. EazyDiner makes sure that a stronger end-to-end control on hygiene and quality of the food is being done that reaches the diners, because your safety is our utmost priority. 

Experience dining the Eazy way !

Order premium, delicious, fresh meats and seafood online at Licious. An online meat shop by meat lovers and for meat lovers, which delivers fresh poultry, meat, seafood, meat masalas and vegetarian plant-based protein.
 
Explore our wide range of fresh meats & seafood online:
 
Chicken: Licious Chicken has an ideal weight which ensures that the meat is just perfect and juicy. Our cold-chain system locks moisture within the chicken, ensuring a juicy bite every time. Licious chickens have no antibiotic residue or hormones. Pick from a wide range of tender juicy chicken cuts for any chicken recipe. Order fresh Chicken online from Licious.
 
Mutton: Licious Mutton comes only from government-approved partners. Our Mutton is pasture-raised & allowed to rest for maximum tenderness. Get perfect tender cuts of Mutton with the right amounts of fat along with a mix of bone-in & boneless pieces. Order Mutton online from Licious.
 
Fish & Seafood: Enjoy a variety of cuts of freshwater and seawater fish which are delivered descaled and degutted for convenient cooking. Our fish is caught daily & delivered straight to your doorstep, fresh within 24 hours of being caught. Licious fish has no added chemicals or antibiotics. Order Fish online from Licious.
 
Prawns: Licious Prawns are caught fresh from bio-secure aquaculture or coastal farms. They do not have any added chemicals or antibiotics & are available in a variety of sizes - all cleaned, deveined & delivered fresh. Order Prawns online at Licious.
 
Eggs: Our range of fresh eggs are naturally laid, cleaned & delivered fresh in breakage-free packs. These eggs are hormone & antibiotic residue-free. We have a wide range of eggs including classic, brown, quail & kadaknath eggs. Get fresh eggs online at Licious.
 
Ready-to-cook Snacks & Starters: Be it crispy snacks, Burger Patties, Chicken Wings or meaty Kebabs and marinades; make your day with our range of Ready-to-Cook Snacks & Starters that get cooked in a matter of minutes. These are freshly marinated using fresh meats & seafood and have no artificial preservatives. Order Snacks & Starters online at Licious.
 
Meat Masalas: The perfect match for our meats, Licious Meat Masalas are chef-crafted masalas made for the meat dishes you love! Our Meat Masalas offer a complete spice mix that requires no additional masalas and is Aroma-Locked (Cryogenically Ground). They contain no artificial preservatives and are made with natural tenderisers for effortless cooking. Order Meat Masala online at Licious.
 
 
UnCrave Plant-Based Protein: Our vegetarian plant-based meats look, cook, taste, and feel just like meat, but are made from plants! They are 100% vegetarian, packed with protein, low on calories and are cholesterol-free! Enjoy vegetarian Seekh Kebab, Galouti Kebab and Keema Fry. Order Plant-Based Meat online.

Keeta – The World’s Leading Food Delivery Service
Craving pizza, fried chicken, sushi, or something new? We’ve got you covered! Whether you’re in the mood for indulgent treats or healthy choices like fresh salads and light meals, Keeta delivers your favourites straight to your door. 

Why Choose Keeta?
1.Easy to Use – Order in seconds!
2.Daily Deals – Free delivery and discounts on every order!
3.Global Cuisines – Explore various tasty options.
4.On-time Promise – Your food arrives fresh and fast. 

How It Works:
1.Download Keeta and pick a restaurant.
2.Select your dishes and checkout.
3.Sit back and enjoy!

Delivering Grocery, Fruits & Vegetables, Milk every day morning at your doorstep by 7AM.

Trusted by 10mn+ people across Mumbai, Delhi, NCR, Hyderabad, Bengaluru, Chennai, and now delivering to all the major cities, our products are an integral part of families looking to cut out preservatives and adulterants from their every day grocery.

Our Preservatives-Free Cow and Buffalo Milk continue to be the most ordered and most recommended products since we started in 2015. Loved for their purity, consistency, and delightful aroma, our milk products are enjoyed by even kids and grandparents! 

Another one of our most ordered products, Country Coconut Water, is a trimmed-top tender coconut sourced from Pollachi. These Pollachi sourced ‘nuts bring you approximately 300ml water every time, and assured sweet, nutty flavour.

We also offer other delightful grocery items like Taaza Paneer, Ghar Jaisa Dahi, Mishti Doi, Taaza Pudina Chaach. Added to that, we are now delivering Fresh Fruits and Vegetables in selected cities. 

Like our flagship Milk and Desi Danedar Ghee, these products too are free of any middlemen intervention, chemical washing, and are delivered through an extensively monitored, advanced cold-chain system.

How does Country Delight deliver direct from the farm?
We engage directly with dairy farmers within 100kms radius of your city to procure fresh Cow and Buffalo milk twice every day. We don’t recombine or overprocess our milk or any other grocery items in our range. After checking its quality over 72 parameters, including synthetic hormones, antibiotics, and naturally occuring toxins, we pasteurise all Milk for safety, and we are delivering it to your homes within just 18-24 hours of collection. Our direct-from-farm and in-house delivery partners help us make your life easier.  

How to receive my order daily?
You can place or modify your order till 12 midnight for Milk and other dairy items. For Grocery fresh fruits and vegetables delivery, the daily cut-off ranges from 10pm to 12pm depending on your location. Our excellent delivery team will place your order at your doorstep. Just open your door to Fresh Milk, Milk Products, Fruits and vegetables anytime after 7 AM. 
It is also easy to get our Milk or fruits and vegetables every day by creating a subscription plan for these essential groceries. Our customizable subscription plan makes life easier in more ways than one. It empowers you to get fresh milk every day while also giving you a transparent view of your monthly spends on groceries. This regular flow of farm-sourced essentials, combined with the flexibility to modify or add more products till midnight, will make consuming clean, healthy, tasty products every day very easy. 

How much time does Country Delight take to deliver?
We take less than 12 hours to deliver fresh, adulteration-tested, FSSAI certified products to your doorstep. To receive Country Delight Milk, place your order anytime till 12 midnight and get assured doorstep delivery by 7AM next morning.  We also deliver our newly launched fruits and vegetables range early morning before you start your day. 
Experience the goodness of farm-fresh, chemical-free grocery delivered every day. 
To know more about our products, download our app. Claim your Rs. 100 Cashback and give our products a try.
